commands.description: List of commands to make available in Yarn scripts

functions.description: List of functions to make available in Yarn scripts

yarnName.description: Name of this method in Yarn Spinner scripts

definitionName.description: Name of this method in code

fileName.description:
Name of the file this method is defined in.
Primarily used when 'Deep Command Lookup' is disabled to make sure the source file is still found (doesn't need to be the full path, even 'foo.cs' is helpful).

language.description: Language id of the method definition.

documentation.description: Description that shows up in suggestions and hover tooltips.

parameters.description:
Method parameters.
Note that if you are overriding information for a method found via parsing code, setting this in json will completely override that parameter information.

async.description: True if the command will be calling a coroutine or task based method.

containsErrors.description: True if the command implementation contains errors that will prevent the command functioning correctly at run time.

yarnName.description: Name of this method in Yarn Spinner scripts

definitionName.description: Name of this method in code

fileName.description:
Name of the file this method is defined in.
Primarily used when 'Deep Command Lookup' is disabled to make sure the source file is still found (doesn't need to be the full path, even 'foo.cs' is helpful).

language.description: Language id of the method definition.

documentation.description: Description that shows up in suggestions and hover tooltips.

parameters.description:
Method parameters.
Note that if you are overriding information for a method found via parsing code, setting this in json will completely override that parameter information.

async.description: True if the function will be calling a task based method.

containsErrors.description: True if the function implementation contains errors that will prevent the function functioning correctly at run time.

subtype.description:
Subtype only exists when "type" has been set to be instance and represents the in-engine type that will be forwarded this command.
In Unity this will nearly always be a monobehaviour subclass

documentation.description: Parameter documentation, used in method signature hinting.

defaultValue.description: Default value if it exists. Also will make this parameter optional for parameter count validation.

isParamsArray.description:
Corresponds to the params keyword in C#. Makes this parameter optional, and further parameters will use the information from this parameter.
Undefined behavior if true for any parameter except for the last.
